title: [stencil] Cig Kofte
content:
Dear folks,  
Typography 2 is over, here is the [final project gallery](http://web.archive.org/web/20150124083244/http:/homes.ieu.edu.tr/~asegalini/0607/t2-project5.gif).  
The 'Tembello Award' prize goes to... Burak Besen !  
His _Çig Köfte_ stencil typeface is available as TT font, [cigkofte.zip](http://web.archive.org/web/20150124083244/http:/homes.ieu.edu.tr/~asegalini/0607/cigkofte.zip).  
Cheers,  
Alessandro

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150124083244im_/http:/typophile.com/files/cgikofte_sample_6007.gif)
author: Alessandro Segalini
